lead_paragraph: The Bank of England said it expected British consumer prices, which have been stuck at a zero percent inflation rate for two months, to pick up by the end of the year as the economy gathers steam.

headline.print_headline: Bank of England Expects Inflation Rate to Pick Up
headline.main: Bank of England Expects Zero Inflation Rate to Pick Up

snippet: The Bank of England said it expected British consumer prices, which have been stuck at a zero percent inflation rate for two months, to pick up by the end of the year as the economy gathers steam.
abstract: Bank of England says it expects Britain's inflation rate, which has been at zero for two months, to rise to 0.6 percent by end of 2015.
